TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 该代码重写方法以自定义， ，和属性时设计图面上呈现控件。The code overrides the method to customize the , , and properties when the control is rendered on a design surface. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用特性将设计器相关联控件。The following example shows how to use the attribute to associate the designer with the control. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#5)]

param.span: 要为其创建模板编辑框架的 。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 则既释放托管资源又释放非托管资源；为 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象占用的非托管资源并（可选）释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`disposing`参数是`true`、方法释放由托管对象持有的所有资源此对象引用。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, the method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

para.span: 方法可以由其他对象调用多次。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写它，请确保不引用对象已释放在以前调用。

span.span: When overriding it, be sure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现此方法的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和方法，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about the and methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String
public: override System::String ^ GetDesignTimeHtml();

summary.span: 获取设计时用于表示 控件的 HTML 标记。

span.span: Gets the HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 设计时用于表示 控件的 HTML 标记。

span.span: The HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便更改的外观设计图面上的控件。The following code example shows how to override the method to alter the appearance of the control on the design surface. 该代码使用`Try...Catch...Finally`语法来执行以下操作：The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following: - `Try`部分更改数据网格控件的属性的值。The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the data grid control. - `Catch`部分捕获任何异常，并将其发送至方法。The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the method. - `Finally`部分将属性设置为其原始值。The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-vb[DataListDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListDesigner_Sample2/VB/simpledatalistdesigner.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets the HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception when an error has been encountered while rendering the control.

returns.span: 设计时为指定的异常显示的 HTML 标记。

span.span: The HTML markup displayed at design time for the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法可以修改的外观发生异常时在设计图面上的控件。The following code example shows how to override the method to modify the appearance of the control on the design surface when an exception occurs. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
